context.flawed_solution:
#### 46
Dan takes 58 licks, Michael takes 63, David takes 70 and Lance takes 39 for a total of 58+63+70+39 = <<58+63+70+39=230>>230 licks
There are 5 people and the total amount of licks is 230 so the average is 230/5 = <<230/5=46>>46 licks to get to the center of a lollipop
